bug.author: karanpathak
bug.summary: Error getting url of the run
bug.description:
Weights and Biases version: 0.9.4 Python version: 3.8.3 Operating System: Windows 10
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
I wanted to get the url of the current run <denchmark-h:h3>What I Did</denchmark-h>
I called the get_url function of the current run. <denchmark-h:h3>Traceback</denchmark-h>
File "D:\KP\anaconda3\envs\torchenv\lib\site-packages\wandb\wandb_run.py", line 670, in get_url self._load_entity(api, network) File "D:\KP\anaconda3\envs\torchenv\lib\site-packages\wandb\wandb_run.py", line 618, in _load_entity raise CommError("Can't connect to network to query entity from API key") wandb.apis.CommError: Can't connect to network to query entity from API key

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/karanpathak>@karanpathak</denchmark-link> thanks for reporting. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/raubitsj>@raubitsj</denchmark-link> could you take a look

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/karanpathak>@karanpathak</denchmark-link> it sounds like this might be a Windows issue. Would you be up for trying our new RC for the updated version of our client library? You can try installing it with the command
Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/cvphelps>@cvphelps</denchmark-link> . I will try it out and post the outcome.

Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/karanpathak>@karanpathak</denchmark-link>
In the past few months we've majorly reworked the CLI and UI for Weights & Biases. We're closing inactivate threads for the time being. Please comment to reopen.
